title: Brush and sans-serif signage font
content:
Hi   
   
Two fonts here - any ideas?   
The sans-serif has a different G and S to Gill Sans.   
The brush script has a different b to the normal (plus stencil cut outs).   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050528000101im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/14822.jpg)   
   
Thanks!
author: deaddodo
